lead_paragraph: BROWN--Dr. Roscoe C. Jr. New York City has lost a transformative leader, and Phipps Houses a valued trustee and friend. A long distance runner, fearless Tuskegee airman, superb educator, and wise advocate, Dr. Roscoe C. Brown, Jr. will be missed but his influence will remain with all of us. We extend our sympathies to his family. Ronay Menschel, Chairman/Phipps Houses Adam Weinstein, President/Phipps Houses Dianne Morales, Exec. Director/ Phipps Neighborhoods 1/3
